pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"该文件夹提供已经不受支持的 CentOS（不含 CentOS Stream）的历史归档。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["需要确定您所需要的小版本，如无特殊需要则使用该大版本的最后一个小版本，比如 6.10，5.11，我们将其标记为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"$minorver"}],"，需要您在之后的命令中替换。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# CentOS 8 之前
minorver=6.10
{{sudo}}sed -e "s|^mirrorlist=|#mirrorlist=|g" \
         -e "s|^#baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/\$releasever|baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$minorver|g" \
         -i.bak \
         /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-*.repo

# CentOS 8 之后
minorver=8.5.2111
{{sudo}}sed -e "s|^mirrorlist=|#mirrorlist=|g" \
         -e "s|^#baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/\$contentdir/\$releasever|baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$minorver|g" \
         -i.bak \
         /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-*.repo","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意其中的",["$r","code",null,{"children":"*"}],"通配符，如果只需要替换一些文件中的源，请自行增删。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意，如果需要启用其中一些 repo，需要将其中的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"enabled=0"}]," 改为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"enabled=1"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后，更新软件包缓存"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache","codeLanguage":"shell"}]]}]

meta.title: CentOS Vault 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
